Name: Golf Party
About the game: Welcome to Golf Party! Mini Golf done right! As a traditional mini golf game we prided ourselves in making a mini golf game that was insanely fun to play with your friends, as well as playing with people you don't know! Currently all game modes can handle up to 20 players! We have Multiple maps, Multiple Game modes including Mini Golf and Racer, Unlockable items, and so much more coming! Current Available Maps Golf mode Alien Planet Castle Golf Park Golf Park 'Night' Dark Fantasy Volcanic Racer Mode Steller Space War Currently in development Golf - Ghost Town We are in development of something never done before to a golf game, Battle Royale! 'Battle Royale is not yet released' In Battle Royale mode you will be put against other players to be the last golf ball standing. In Battle Royale mode you will have different game types to play including, first to the hole, racing, and various mini games! We hope you enjoy Golf Party as much as we do and hope to see you in game!
